item.title: FT Most Read: Thursday, April 18, 2024 at 4:00 AM UTC
item.description:
1. High-speed trader Jane Street raked in $4.4bn at start of 2024
2. Tesla asks shareholders to approve move to Texas and ratify Musk’s pay
3. Boeing engineer says safety concerns are ignored inside plane maker
4. US deficit poses ‘significant risks’ to global economy, warns IMF
5. Trump falls $75mn behind Biden in money race as donor base shrinks
item.guid: FT Most Read: Thursday, April 18, 2024 at 4:00 AM UTC
